snippet.title: Mission Zigloton Trailer
snippet.description:
Mission Zigloton is a FREE platformer featuring hand-animated characters.

Help Zigloton steal an old relic on his journey to infiltrate a mysterious planet, in this challenging platformer developped and hand-animated by one person. 

PLAY NOW ON STEAM : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1236070/Mission_Zigloton/?curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Ben_Lega_Vidya
Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ben_lega_vidya/
